issues.issueDescription: A user should be specified in the dockerfile, otherwise the image will run as root
issues.remediationSteps:
Expected Value: 
The 'Dockerfile' contains the 'USER' instruction

Actual Value:
The 'Dockerfile' does not contain any 'USER' instruction

 More info: https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/builder/#user

issues.issueDescription: Using ADD to load external installation scripts could lead to an evil web server leveraging this and loading a malicious script.
issues.remediationSteps:
Expected Value: 
'COPY' ./entrypoint.sh

Actual Value:
'ADD' ./entrypoint.sh

 More info: https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/builder/#add

issues.issueDescription: Ensure that HEALTHCHECK is being used. The HEALTHCHECK instruction tells Docker how to test a container to check that it is still working
issues.remediationSteps:
Expected Value: 
Dockerfile contains instruction 'HEALTHCHECK'

Actual Value:
Dockerfile doesn't contain instruction 'HEALTHCHECK'

 More info: https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/builder/#healthcheck
